jobs.name: GLM Endpoint Health Check
jobs.description: Verify GLM models are available across providers

payload.message: GLM health check. 1) Local Morpheus proxy — is glm-5 responding? Is glm-4.7-flash responding? Test with a quick prompt. 2) Morpheus Gateway — available? 3) Latency comparison: local vs gateway. Only alert if something is down or quality degraded — skip if everything is healthy.

jobs.name: Monthly GLM Performance Report
jobs.description: Monthly review of GLM usage, quality, and cost

payload.message: Monthly GLM report. 1) Usage: requests by model (GLM-5 vs Flash), total tokens. 2) Routing: what percentage of tasks went to GLM vs fallback? Why did fallbacks happen? 3) Quality: any patterns in tasks where GLM excelled or struggled? 4) Cost: inference cost via Morpheus (MOR staking value) vs equivalent centralized API pricing. 5) New releases: any new GLM models from Zhipu worth evaluating. 6) Recommendations for next month's routing.
